meanings.definition: Covering or extending over the entire face.
meanings.sent1: The mask was fullface, hiding every part of the face.
meanings.sent2: She wore a fullface veil for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The fullface makeup made her unrecognizable at the masquerade.
meanings.sent4: His fullface smile lit up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The fullface shield protected him from the flying debris.

meanings.definition: A type of helmet that covers the entire face.
meanings.sent1: The motorcycle rider wore a fullface helmet for safety.
meanings.sent2: The fullface shield on the helmet provided extra protection.
meanings.sent3: The fullface helmet made him look like a futuristic warrior.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a space explorer with the fullface helmet on.
meanings.sent5: The fullface helmet muffled the sounds of the bustling city.

meanings.definition: To confront or deal with something directly and openly.
meanings.sent1: She decided to fullface her fears and speak in public.
meanings.sent2: He needed to fullface the challenge head-on.
meanings.sent3: The team fullfaced the opponent with determination.
meanings.sent4: She fullfaced the difficult situation with courage.
meanings.sent5: They fullfaced the truth and accepted the consequences.
